description: The group maintains a beautiful park and playground built by the Port Authority and a 22 terrace DOT step street year round. Mini-gardens, scattered throughout the park and terraces are a source of pride and rejuvenation in the neighborhood. The group holds workshops, runs a Nature trail walk (created by kids), clean-ups days, a year round youth leadership program and other neighborhood events.
name: West 181st  Street Beaut. Proj.
open hours: This garden is in a DOT step-street; there are 22 terraces alongside a wide flight of steps, with benches at the landings. The bench areas are open to the public at all times (24 hours/day).
